name: ext_R4_ExplanationOfBenefit_processNote
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ExplanationOfBenefit.processNote for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.processNote from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: A note that describes or explains adjudication results in a human readable form.
element.comment: `ExplanationOfBenefit.processNote` has no related element in R2:ExplanationOfBenefit

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
